profile.title: Yusa Profail
profile.mustLogin: Yu mas sign in pastaim long lukim ol seting.
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Soim orijinal wantaim trenslesen long sait
profile.disappearingMessages: Onim tok we i lus bihain liklik taim
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sekens bipo em i delitim yet
profile.saveError: Err: Nogo inap long sevim ol seting
profile.avatarError: Sampi i kamap long uploadim avatā
profile.noPrivateKey: Nogat praiwet ki long dispela divais bilong export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Putim wanpela paswur long enkriptem bekap:
profile.importSuccess: Praiwet ki i kam insait long dispela divais.
profile.importFailed: Import i lus (rong paswur o fail i bagarap).
profile.keysRotated: Niu ki-pia i redi na pablik ki i upload pinis.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Praiwet ki bilong yu i no lusim dispela divais. Exportim wanpela kopi i gat paswur bilong yusim long narapela divais.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Yu stap long Fri plan — yusim kwik Son/Mun opsen daunbilo. Upgred long kisim moa tim.
profile.backupDesc: Mekim bekap i gat paswur bilong ol ki, na restore long narapela divais bilong mekim sink.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Blur taim app i no long fes
profile.notifyOnCopy: Tokim mi sapos man i kopiim tok bilong mi
profile.followHint: Stori bilong em bai kamap long Fil bilong ‘Following’ sapos em i postim long ‘Followers’ (o ‘Public’).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sampela samting i rong long dispela seksen.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Forwadim ol kol na teks i kam insait long fon o imel yu bin verifaim. Taim yu kol/teks i go aut, em inap soim namba Chatforia bilong yu.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Forwadim teks i go long fon
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Forwadim teks i go long imel
profile.forwardSaved: Ol seting bilong forwading i sevim pinis
profile.errSmsDest: Makim wanpela ples bilong kisim (fon o imel).
profile.errQuietHours: Kwait awa i mas stap namel long 0 na 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Makim teks o chatrum na stat toktok
chat.emptySubtitle: Salim wanpela tok long statim chat.

status.captionLabel: Wanem samting i stap long tingting bilong yu?
status.filesNote: Inap long 5 fail. 24 awa tasol long stap.

premium.heading: Go Premium
premium.description: Opim strongpela ol fea na rausim ol ad.
premium.upgradeAria: Upgred i go long Chatforia Premium

auth.headline: Sekiua, global mesinjing wantaim tanim tok kwiktaim
auth.description: End-to-end enkripsen, AI i tanim tok, tok we i lus, na kol/vidio kol.

feature.encryption: End-to-end enkripsen i stap olgeta taim
feature.disappearing: Tok we i lus na rit risit
feature.privacy: Praivasi pastaim. Data bilong yu, kontrol bilong yu.

auth.desktopTip: Yu stap long desktop? Scanim wantaim fon bilong kisim app.
auth.subhead: Praivet, enkrip, na tanim tok — kwiktaim.
auth.tip: Yu inap yusim Chatforia long olgeta divais — o daunlodim app bilong nambawan eksperiens.
auth.scanHint: Scanim long daunlodim app o openim long brausa.

home.title: Hom
home.subheader: Salim wanpela tok long statim chat.

press.title: Pris
press.contact: Sapos yu gat ol askim, raitim long press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Sapos yu gat askim, raitim long press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia em i sekiua mesinja wantaim tanim tok kwiktaim na E2E enkripsen, bilong mekim global toktok i praivet na isi.
press.assetsText: Logo, skrinshot, na ol piksa bilong produkt (bihain bai kam).

careers.title: Wok
careers.intro: Mipela i liklik tim i wokim wanpela praivet, global mesinja. Sapos yu tingting strong long enkripsen, aksesibiliti, na naispela UX, toktok wantaim mipela.
careers.openRoles: Ol hap wok i op: Injinia (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Prodak, Sapot.
careers.apply: Ol rot bilong apraim: Salim CV/links long jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Long Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia em i sekiua, multilngual mesinja wantaim end-to-end enkripsen, tanim tok kwiktaim, na kol/vidio kol. Misien bilong mipela: helpim ol manmeri long konek — seif, praivet, na antap long tokples baret.

values.control: Kontrol: Tok we i lus na rit risit em opsen tasol.

about.howDescription: Ol tok i enkrip long divais bilong yu pastaim bipo i go aut. Tanim tok, bekap, na sink i mekim olsem seva i luk liklik tasol.

advertise.title: Advertais wantaim Chatforia
advertise.description: Risim ol yusa i stap long mesinjing wantaim naispla, sef ol plesmen. Mipela i gat bana, sponso sip na haus promos. Ol yusa Premium i no lukim ad.

adsense.withPubId: Nau mipela i yusim Google AdSense. Sapos yu laik taragetim mipela long Google Ads, yusim publisher ID {{pubId}} na askim long manesim plesmen long ol yun antap. Direkt sponses i stap — yusim fom.
adsense.noPubId: Nau mipela i yusim Google AdSense. Direkt sponses tu i stap — yusim fom daunbilo.

advertise.noPlacements: Nogat plesmen i setap yet. Putim ol long ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Planty taim yusa i stap insait long chat UI
why.brandSafe: Brand-sef format; gutpela limit bilong ofen soim
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponso taim (olsem “Start a Chat” modal) i stap
why.deals: Direkt dil o programatik long AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Tenkyu! Tok bilong yu i go pinis. Bai mipela i bekim bihain.
form.missingRequired: Plis pulim nem, imel, na mesej.
form.successToast: Tenkyu! Bai mipela i tokbek kwik.
form.mailtoInfo: Bai opim imel klain blong salim askim…
form.messageLabel: Tokim mipela long kempen bilong yu
form.messagePlaceholder: Taraget, de, KPI, ol plesmen yu laikim…

legal.disclaimerStart: Taim yu salim, yu orait wantaim

upgrade.title: Upgred
upgrade.subtitle: Painim plan stret long yu: rausim ad wantaim Plus, o kisim fulpela strong fea wantaim Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Sabsikripsen bai pinis
scheduleBanner.body: Bai yu go bek long Fri long

free.title: Fri
free.ctaUnavailable: Senisim i go Fri (i no redi)

gettingStarted.title: Statim Yus
gettingStarted.subtitle: Yu nupela long Chatforia? Dispela kwik stat bai soim ol samting as na bai yu redi kwik.

alert.text: Dispela gaid bai gro taim mipela i lansim ol niu fea. Sapos samting i lus, tokim mipela long

section2.title: 2) Statim mesinjing
section2.item1: Mekim DM o Grup na salim namba wan tok.
section2.item2: Yusim tanim tok kwiktaim long toktok long 100+ tokples.
section2.item3: Traim tok we i lus na rit risit long Profail → Praivasi.

section3.title: 3) Go moa
section3.item1Part2: pes (Plus = no ad, Premium = ful fea).
section3.item2Part1: Linkim moa divais na setimap enkrip bekap long

account.q: Olsem wanem long mekim o kisim bek akaun bilong mi?
account.a: Daunlodim app o yusim web, tap “Mekim akaun”, verifaim imel/fon. Long kisim bek, yusim “Foget paswur”.

privacy.q: Ol tok i gat end-to-end enkripsen?
privacy.a: Yes. Ol tok na kol i gat end-to-end enkripsen olgeta taim. Tasol yu na man yu toktok wantaim tasol inap ritim.

translate.q: Tanim tok kwiktaim i wok olsem wanem?
translate.a: Onim “Tanim tok otomatik” long Seting → Luk & Tokples. Planti taim mipela i mekim long divais, sapos nogat bai yusim sef API wantaim liklik metadata tasol.

contact.a: Raitim long support@chatforia.com. Putim skrinshot na vesin bilong app.

contact.title: Kontakim Mipela
contact.successMsg: Tenkyu — tim bai bekim yu long imel.
contact.errorSend: Nogo inap salim. Plis imel long support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Dispela Praivasi Polisi i tokaut olsem Chatforia (“mipela”) i kisim, yusim, na searim infomesen taim yu yusim ol app na sevis bilong mipela. Mipela i desainim Chatforia bilong mekim data mipela inap lukim i liklik tru.

infoWeCollect.title: Ol infomesen mipela i kisim
infoWeCollect.account: Akaun infomesen (olsem imel/fon) bilong wokim na sekiurim akaun.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Enkrip konten (ol tok/kol) em i E2E; mipela i no inap ritim.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostik/ yus — ol kain olsem kras log, kain divais, o liklik analitiks bilong mekim wok i gut.

howWeUse.title: Ol rot mipela i yusim infomesen
howWeUse.provide: Saplai na sekiurim sevis (ot, painim spem/riad).
howWeUse.improve: Impruvim ol fea (kwaeliti bilong tanim tok, reliabiliti).

sharing.title: Searim
sharing.body: Mipela i no salim pesonal data. Sampela taim mipela inap searim liklik data wantaim ol wokman (olsem pus notifikasen, analitiks) aninit long strongkontrak.

rights.title: Ol rait bilong yu
rights.body: Lain long sampela hap (olsem GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA) i gat rait long askim long lukim, stretim, dilitim, o stopim sampela prosesen. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Holim data & sekiuriti
retention.body: Mipela i holim tasol samting i nid long ranim sevis na yusim sekiuriti bilong indastri. E2E konten mipela i no inap rausim enkrip.

children.title: Pikinini
children.body: Chatforia i no bilong pikinini aninit 13 (o olsem lo bilong hap yu stap i tok).

changes.title: Senis
changes.body: Mipela bai putim apdeit hia na senisim “Las apdeit” de.

intro.body: Taim yu yusim Chatforia, yu orait long ol dispela Tams. Sapos yu no orait, plis no yusim sevis.

accounts.title: Akaun
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Saplai tru infomesen na lukautim ol pasin bilong sekiurim.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Yu yet i risponsibol long ol samting i kamap long akaun bilong yu.

acceptableUse.title: Gutpela yus
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No ken salim ilegal, abusiv, o infrinjing konten; no spem o otomatik abus.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Mipela inap sospend/terminet sapos yu brukim ol rul.

yourContent.title: Konten bilong yu
yourContent.body: Yu yet i holim rait long konten bilong yu. Yu givim mipela ol rait i nid long ranim sevis (olsem rautim, stoa, tanim tok).

disclaimer.title: Disklêma & liabiliti
disclaimer.body: Sevis i kam “olsem em i stap” wantaim nogat worranti. Long namba antap we lo i orait, Chatforia i no holim liabiliti long ol hevi we i kamap stret o bihain.

changes.title: Senis
changes.body: Mipela inap apdeitim ol dispela tams; taim yu yusim bihain long senis, em i makim yu orait.

doNotSell.title: No Ken Salim o Searim Pesonal Infomesen Bilong Mi
doNotSell.body: Chatforia i no salim pesonal infomesen. Tasol ol manmeri bilong Kalifonia inap yet salim rekues aninit long CPRA wantaim batin daunbilo.

cookies.title: Kuki Seting
cookies.body: Chatforia i yusim kuki liklik tasol (olsem sesen, sekiuriti). Mipela i no yusim kuki bilong ad pêti-3. Manesim kuki long seting bilong brausa.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: No inap long lodim stetas bilong namba.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Nogat namba i givim yet. Makim namba long aria kod bilong statim teks.

startChatModal.title: Statim chat
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Raitim nem, yusa nem, fon, o imel…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Statim chat wantaim ol yu makim
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Painim long yusa nem o fon
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Raitim yusa nem o fon na pres Painim.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Ol fon/imel bai stap redi bihain taim yu sevim ol olsem kontak.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Lus long statim chat wantaim ol manmeri yu makim.

sounds.freeNotice: Yu stap long Fri — ol premium ton i so tasol i lok. Upgred long opim olgeta.
sounds.resetToDefaults: Reset i go bek long defol

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Dispela fea i nidim Premium plan.

aiSettings.title: AI Seting
aiSettings.controlIntro: Kontrolim tanim tok, smart replies, na ForiaBot auto-respons.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Tanim tok otomatik taim i kam insait
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Salim ol las sampela tok (klinim pinis) i go long AI long makim kwik bekim.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Maskim rabis tok long AI sapjesen
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Sapos on, AI sapjesen bai maskim ol tok nogut
aiSettings.translateAll: Tanim olgeta tok i kam insait

accessibilitySettings.title: Aksesibiliti & Alot
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Ol opsen long mekim Chatforia i isi long yusim maski yu no harim.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: I stat long sais normal. Inkrisim long aksesibiliti seting sapos yu laik bikpela teks.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Visuel alot bilong tok & kol
Soim banas na taitel i blink bai yu no lusim aktiviti.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vibret taim niu tok i kam (taim divais i sapotim)
Ranim vibresen wantaim notifikasen.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Plas skrin taim kol i kam
Sotpela lait strong taim kol i ring.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Transkraibim vois not otomatik
Sotpela teks i go wantaim audio yu kisim.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Soim banas na taitel blink bai yu no lusim aktiviti.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vibret taim niu tok i kam (sapos sapot)
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Plas skrin taim kol i kam
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Sotpela lait strong taim kol i ring.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Stoa tasol saitafekis long seva. Em i pasim AI/Trenslet na modiresen preview.

help.title: Help
help.howCanWeHelp: Olsem wanem mipela inap helpim yu?

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Painim long alias, nem, yusa nem, o fon
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Searem invait link bilong yu na statim chat kwik.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Stap konek long rot wantaim Chatforia long iOS na Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Ol tok bilong yu bai stap sink namel long web na mobail.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Mitim narapela kwiktaim. Mipela bai painim wanpela match na opim timporeli chatrum.
randomChat.saveGuard: Tasol chat man-long-man tasol inap save
